column4: http://oliwer.net/b/volwheel.html should be in the repos aswell
I figured you would say that, but it isn't in the repos, so i guess i must build it.
meh, compiling isn't too hard, and handy aswell. its a shame ubuntu doesn't have volwheel (well prob due to the fact that it really is a pro-gnome distro)
yeah, i just built it now, quite surprising how quick that was, in a virtual machine too
